content.text: Can you help me deploy an NFT collection?

I'll help you deploy your NFT collection. First, I'll need some basic information: collection name, symbol, total supply, and whether you want to enable royalties. I'll then guide you through the process of metadata generation, IPFS upload, and smart contract deployment. Would you like to proceed with the deployment?
How do I configure royalties for my collection?

I can help you set up royalties. The current standard supports up to 10% royalty fees. I recommend setting it at 5% for optimal market acceptance. I'll configure the royalty receiver address and percentage in the smart contract. Would you like me to implement this configuration now?
